mars.title: The First Humans on Mars
mars.sub: Create the first cosmic base on planet Mars!

themes.title: Topics of lessons
theme: supplying the bases with energy, by using sun and wind power stations;
learning how to obtain fertilizers and grow food;
creating new stories, myths and legends for the people generation in Mars;
themes.sub: There is no individual registration for lessons.

gameDesign.title: Game design with "Minecraft"
gameDesign.desc: Vaikai tampa kolonijos erdvėlaivio įgula, kuri sprendžia įvairias užduotis kartu su laivo valdymo robotu ir taip mokosi apie žaidimų dizainą!

marsPackage.title: Organizations that get interactive "Three Cubes" lessons are provided with

ecology.title: Informal education in United Kingdom
text: Modules of different themes let children improve knowledge on various topics, e.g. Carbon Monoxide, Climate Change.
Learn about Carbon Monoxide in a safe virtual environment in "Minecraft" and Climate Change during an interactive expedition in Antarctica!
Students solve exercises individually and in teams.
Students and schools in United Kingdom have started these interactive lessons with "Minecraft"

mars.title: Formal education in the United States
text: The course "First Humans on Mars" can aim to improve knowledge on mathematics, biology, chemistry, geography and astronomy.
The course consist of virtual Mars world and interactive exercises for students.
Students solve exercises individually and collaborating in teams.
Schools in the United States use "Three Cubes" lessons in their formal education.

gigaF.title: TESLA Gigafactory 2 with "Minecraft"
text: "Tesla" has shared the video of the project in it's official "Twitter" account, saying that "Lithuania knows the way to our hearts".
During "Gigaton" a team has came up with an idea to build "Tesla Gigafactory 2" in "Minecraft".
Students solve exercises individually and collaborating in teams.
Students and schools in the United Kingdom use "Three Cubes" lessons with "Minecraft".
The video of the project has gained over 260,000 views on "Youtube".

Vilnius.title: Lithuania related projects
text: We recreated historical Vilnius in 5 different epochs.
We rebuilt one of the most important Vilnius places: Gediminas Castle Tower, The Cathedral Square, National Museum - Palace of the Grand Dukes of Lithuania and the surrounding territory.
"Minecraft" builders consisted of students in schools and universities.
10 different Vilnius schools have tried out the maps with VR!
The video of the project gained over 40,000 views on "Youtube" platformoje.

3kids.title: Trys pradinukai
text: 3 educational adventures for improving knowledge on Lithuania's history.
Educational adventure themes: "Rescuing Vytis", "The Teasure of the Dukes" ir "The Act of Independence".
Some voices of the characters' are recorded by well-known people in Lithuania - Gabrielius Liaudanskas-Svaras and Liudas Mažylis.
Educational adventures can be downloaded and used for free
The video of the project has gained over 12,000 views on "Youtube".

gedas.title: Improve Gediminas with "Minecraft"
text: Just in 3 days 12 builders of "Three Cubes" have managed to creatively recreate Vilnius territory from 2,300,000 blocks during livestrem.
Together with telecom organisation "Labas", "Three Cubes" has came up with a project to creatively recreate Gediminas Castle Tower.
The main architect of building with "Minecraft" was youtuber and "Three Cubes" Co-Founder Darius Kniūkšta.
The event moderator was Orijus Gasanovas, comedians Mantas Katleris and Mantas Bartuševičius, historian Aurimas Švedas joined the livestream.
The video of the project has gained over 155,000 views on "Facebook".

cardMain: Lietuviui pomėgis žaisti kompiuterinius žaidimus tapo profesija.
Kitas lygis. Tinklalaidė apie žaidimų industriją Lietuvoje.
cardAll: "Trys kubai" pristatymas LR Seime apie mokymąsi su "Minecraft"
"Trys kubai" įgytas sertifikatas, atliktus "Minecraft" edukacinės platformos kursus Briuselyje "Microsoft" ofise
"Trys kubai" salė su "Minecraft" projektais, turinio kūrėjais ir pristatymais apie "Youtube" renginyje "GameOn 2017"
"Trys kubai" stendas su "Minecraft" turnyru, turinio kūrėjais ir diskusijomis renginyje "Comic Con Baltics 2017"
"Trys kubai" stendas su "Minecraft" edukaciniais nuotykiais parodoje "Mokykla 2019"
"Hour of Code" renginys rengtas kartu su "Microsoft" ir MO muziejumi
